overview:
Markus Beyr (born September 8, 1971), serial entrepreneur and attraction producer for 20 years. Vast experience in the Exhibition, Museum and Leisure industry. Created new leisure genres and dominated themed entertainment industry in individual fields. Member of Advisory Board IMERSA Association. Member of European Committee of IAAPA Association.

Attraktion! is Markus Beyr’s majority owned holding company. Attraktion! offers project development services for leisure projects, and invests into the development of new leisure genres & attraction products with integrated invention & investment arm.

Playoke is one of the first investments of Attraktion! and the world’s first group interaction game.
